__e: There was an armory in my hometown.
Some guy who works in a gun factory.

This chocolate factory isn't only factory.
No, I meant the kids are the hazards - look at Charlie And The Chocolate Factory.
You know I didn't mean anything by the chocolate factory remark, right?
"Is this a home or a gun factory? Greetings, bhabhi-ji."
